info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 3:57PM MDT until August 12 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ADA...SOUTHWESTERN BOISE AND NORTHWESTERN ELMORE COUNTIES... At 357 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lucky Peak Reservoir, or 13 miles east of Boise, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Lucky Peak Spring Shores Marina around 400 PM MDT. Arrowrock Dam, Lucky Peak Reservoir and Aldape Summit around 410 PM MDT. Arrowrock Reservoir around 420 PM MDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
